alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 10:10AM MST until January 15 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Davenport, Brewster, Porthill, Colville, Carlton, Priest River, Rathdrum, Conconully, Inchelium, Spokane, Chesaw, Nespelem, Methow, Othello, Metaline Falls, Danville, Bonners Ferry, Omak, Wauconda, Okanogan, Fruitland, Coeur d`Alene, Loomis, Palisades, Quincy, Winthrop, Waterville, Tiger, Nighthawk, Twisp, Ephrata, Arden, Worley, Cheney, Hayden, Newman Lake, Kettle Falls, Malott, Elk, Mansfield, Monse, Chelan, Oroville, Mazama, Coolin, Entiat, Eastport, Naples, Chewelah, Molson, Post Falls, Clayton, Metaline, Orin, Wenatchee, Bridgeport, Sandpoint, Curlew, Rockford, Malo, Deer Park, Newport, Republic, Cashmere, Winchester, Ione, and Moses Lake. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Be alert to slick conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low visibilities will impact travel on portions of Highway 2, Highway 97 and parts of I-90.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
